includeInlineNotice.message: NOTE: As of Thunderbird 140, most inline-attached items are detachable; use the "include inline" option below to include them in the detachment process.

rn1_8_8_New01.message: Most inline images will now be recognized as attachments rather than "embeds" (Thunderbird 140+ only)

rn1_8_8_New02.message: Inline images recognized as attachments will be available for permanent detachment (Thunderbird 140+ only)
